text: Nígbà tí ó bí i, ó sọ pé: “Olúwa mi, dájúdájú mo bí i ní obìnrin - Allāhu sì nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa ohun tí ó bí – ọkùnrin kò sì dà bí obìnrin. Dájúdájú èmi sọ ọ́ ní Mọryam. Àti pé dájúdájú mò ń fi Ọ́ wá ààbò fún òun àti àrọ́mọdọ́mọ rẹ̀ lọ́dọ̀ Èṣù, ẹni ẹ̀kọ̀.”
